arts.sum: Everton women’s newest signing Ornella Vignola scored a hat-trick on her Women’sSuper League debut as Brian Sørensen’s women came from behind to ploy a 4-1win over city rivals Liverpool at Anfield. Liverpool took the lead inside the 12th minute when Cornelia Kapocs broke freedown the left before cutting the ball back into the penalty area and drilling the ball inoff the underside off the crossbar. Liverpool defender Gemma Bonner saw her effort at the back post from a free-kickpushed onto […] The post Liverpool Women 1-4 Everton Women appeared first on Grand Old Team.

arts.ttl: Ornella Vignola Hatrick seals Everton Derby Demolition
arts.sum: Liverpool 1 - 4 Everton By Gethin Thurlow 7/9/25 Above: Vignola with boss Brian Sorensen as she signs for Everton Photo: EvertonWomen on X Ornella Vignola’s dream debut saw Everton to a perfect start to the WSL campaign, as Brian Sorensen tactical nous shone through and the Gareth Taylor era at Liverpool got off to…
